alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:58PM CDT until July 17 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR LACLEDE AND SOUTHWESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lebanon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Fort Leonard Wood, Lebanon, Bennett Spring State Park, Morgan, Conway, Phillipsburg, Bennett Springs, Twin Bridges, Competition, Lynchburg, Sleeper, Falcon and Dry Knob. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 112 and 140. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
